title: Rustdoc cann't build rust documentation with custom libdir

labels.name: T-rustdoc
labels.description: Relevant to the rustdoc team, which will review and decide on the PR/issue.

labels.name: T-bootstrap
labels.description: Relevant to the bootstrap subteam: Rust's build system (x.py and src/bootstrap)

body:
After https://github.com/rust-lang/rust/pull/58238 it was broken again:

```
Documenting stage2 std (x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu)
      c Assemble { target_compiler: Compiler { stage: 2, host: "x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu" } }
```
